name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: dfs.client.hedged.read.threadpool.size
description:
Support 'hedged' reads in DFSClient. To enable this feature, set the parameter
    to a positive number. The threadpool size is how many threads to dedicate
    to the running of these 'hedged', concurrent reads in your client.

name: dfs.client.deadnode.detection.probe.suspectnode.threads
description: The maximum number of threads to use for probing suspect node.

name: dfs.client.retry.max.attempts
description: Max retry attempts for DFSClient talking to namenodes.

name: dfs.namenode.startup.delay.block.deletion.sec
description:
The delay in seconds at which we will pause the blocks deletion
    after Namenode startup. By default it's disabled.
    In the case a directory has large number of directories and files are
    deleted, suggested delay is one hour to give the administrator enough time
    to notice large number of pending deletion blocks and take corrective
    action.

name: dfs.client.failover.max.attempts
description:
Expert only. The number of client failover attempts that should be
    made before the failover is considered failed.
